thread.title_full: A Christ Explains Life on Earth: Heaven and Hell! | U. S. Politics

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: A Christ Explains Life on Earth: Heaven and Hell! | U. S. Politics
text:
(Before It's News) A Christ Explains Life on Earth: Heaven and Hell!
By: Raymond Ronald Karczewski© — A Living Christ
Prepare yourselves, for I, this Living Christ am about to shake you to your very core of sensibility.
If you are LIVING LIFE THROUGH YOUR EGO, you are Living in Hell.
I am addressing this to most of you who are still struggling to understand yourselves and your purpose for being alive in this life at this time.
Most of you will not get this and will struggle fiercely to reject such simple Truth, as your pride will be hurt. Those on the brink of spiritual insight, who have the “Eyes to see and Ears to hear” will get it, while those not quite ready to shuck their Satanic Conditioning will fight like hell to remain in, and defend their conditioned Ignorance.
Damn near all enslaved civilized human beings presently are Living a Lie. An Illusion which has been imposed upon you through parental conditioning who themselves were tethered to the satanic authority of government and religion which owes its existence to the satanic ruled Intellect and has promulgated much pain, suffering and division into your Intellectually driven consciousness via MIND CONTROL. The Intellect has been the satanic scourge of Mankind and remains intact from the beginning of time to this present moment. Hell, isn’t It?
Such consciousness is necessary to train Intellectually driven people into living in the physical, sensory realm which subverts the Living NON-DUALISTIC Truth, into the Dead, DUALISTIC “Idea of Truth.”
Intellect is quite necessary to navigate life and problem solving issues at the Technical level, and to communicate with other Intellects. However it keeps all locked into the dualistic, opposing, partial realm of consciousness, and leaves them oblivious to the rest of holistic LIFE.
There is another level of Consciousness which may be called Spiritual. This level of Awareness, resonates with the nondualistic energy of Direct Perception of Truth and is accessed only in moment of Insight, brief, fleeting moments of unique, holistic, unreplicatable energy experienced when the Noise of the chattering, belief-ridded Intellect is ultimately silenced.
Truth IS God. Infinite Intelligence which is Wholistic, (holy), complete, undivided. “The Idea of Truth” can only be found via the Intellect is SATANIC. It is partial in nature, divided, and Opposing. It is the Realm of Hell, and you all think it is normal.
Intellect is a counterfeit reality, where the “idea of truth” is worshipped, and TRUTH BE DAMNED. It is found in all those who consider themselves, CIVILIZED, while they support and defend all the ills of WARS, TYRANNY, EXPLOITATION AND DEPRAVITY, while they dream of beautiful illusions as a means of escapism. It is the SATANIC MATRIX which rules over civilized beings.
You see, TRUTH is self-evident, nondualistic. It cannot be argued or debated. IT IS WHAT IS!
I, this Living Christ, acknowledge your limitedness of consciousness, and have sought for twenty years on the Internet, to break the Hypnotic Satanic Spell which binds you to your self-consentual slavery.
Check the sites listed below. You can read for yourself the Resistance to such an act of Love.
You will all come to Truth sooner or later. Until that moment arrives, YOU WILL NOT HAVE A CLUE AS TO WHAT LIFE IS ALL ABOUT!
”No other man but I, in the recorded History of mankind, including JESUS CHRIST, has directly revealed to the World the SATANIC WEAPON used to enslave mankind – INTELLECTUAL THOUGHT!!”
Raymond Ronald Karczewski© — A Living Christ
Watch my You-Tube Videos at:
http://www.arkenterprises.com/index.html#Gospel
